Description

This is a BC based company looking for a Senior Web Developer. This position will be fully remote, although they would prefer BC based candidates. The ideal candidate would have 4-7 years worth of experience working in a web development environment, with fantastic communication ability. The role has plenty of growth opportunity for the right person, and will report to the business owner.

This would be working on all aspects of their internal programming, working primarily within a PHP coding environment. The ideal candidate would also have some experience working with both Expression Engine and CraftCMS. You will be working directly with customers of our client, working on their projects end to end, from requirement gathering, through to implementation and maintenance. This role will be working closely with both internal and external stakeholders ensuring that their needs are met.

This is a full-time position that includes a competitive base salary, extended benefits, and paid vacation.

[ HOW TO APPLY / INTERVIEW PROCESS ]

If you're interested in pursuing this role, please contact me for an initial discussion. This is a chance for us to discuss specifics, such as the company name, the key hiring managers, and the more in-depth job requirements. This is also a great opportunity to talk about your overall career goals and preferences. We can even discuss other potential roles which may fit what you're looking for.

Requirements

Here are some of the items that you'll bring to the table for this role:

[-] Experience working with PHP (around 4-7 years)

[-] Experience working with Expression Engine / CraftCMS

[-] Considerable experience working with JavaScript / MySQL

[-] Strong communication and professionalism when working with customers.

[ VISA / RELOCATION SUPPORT ]

[-] Preference will be given to candidates who are currently in Prince George with proper working permission to work in Canada

[-] No relocation or VISA sponsorship support will be offered for this role
